actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: Resolution expressing to foreign nations to determination of the House of Representatives to insure continuity in U.S. foreign policy.

summary.text: States that, in view of the exceptional circumstances now facing the Government of the United States, the United States House of Representatives wishes to make known to all foreign nations that it is determined: (1) to assure and to provide for the continuity of the foreign policy objectives of the United States; (2) to insure the fulfillment of the international obligations of the United States; and (3) to support, in accordance with the Constitution and the laws of the United States, measures or actions which may be deemed necessary to achieve these objectives.

titles.title: Resolution expressing to foreign nations to determination of the House of Representatives to insure continuity in U.S. foreign policy.
